BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System Linezolid (0.25-16 μg/mL) - Streptococcus ID/AST or AST
BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent linezolid (0.25-16 μg/mL) - Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System with Linezolid for Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only panels
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for rapid in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of most Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria and most Gram-positive isolates including Enterobacteriaceae, Non-Enterobacteriaceae, Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, and Streptococcus, including the addition of linezolid (0.25-16 μg/mL) to Streptococcus panels.
